preview.title: {isEnable, plural, =1 {Enable as Collateral} other {Disable as Collateral}}
preview.content: {isEnable, plural, =1 {Each asset used as collateral increases your borrowing limit. Be careful, this can subject the asset to being seized in liquidation.} other {Disabling an asset as collateral will remove it from your borrowing limit, and no longer subject it to liquidation}}

loading.title: {isEnable, plural, =1 {Enable as Collateral} other {Disabling as Collateral}}
loading.content: {isEnable, plural, =1 {Confirm the transaction with {walletName}} other {Confirm the transaction with {walletName}}}

confirm.title: {isEnable, plural, =1 {Enable as Collateral} other {Disabling as Collateral}}
confirm.content: {isEnable, plural, =1 {You have enable {tokenName} as a Collateral} other {You have disable {tokenName} as a Collateral}}

loading.content: {isSupply, plural, =1 {Supplying Token please wait...} other {Withdrawing Token please wait...}}

confirm.additionInfo: You can check you transaction history in the Actvity menu.

error.title: Error
error.content: {isSupply, plural, =1 {Token Suppply Failed} other {Token Withdraw Failed}}

loading.content: {isBorrow, plural, =1 {Borrowing Token please wait...} other {Repaying Token please wait...}}

confirm.additionInfo: You can check you transaction history in the Actvity menu.

error.title: Error
